identifier: aaa pro screening inc:lake worth, tx

reviews.text: Ivan (AAAScreening) did a wonderful job on my patio.  The job was complicated due to a drainage issue on my property but Ivan and his crew solved the problem and gave me a beautiful extended patio that is draining perfectly and is absolutely beautiful!  His workmanship is superb. I highly recommend Ivan for any project involving patio enclosures.

Ivan did an excellent job on our screen room. He is very detailed orientated and cares about his work. Neighbors have commented on how nice it looks. It not only looks nice, it is a nice solid screen room. No leaks what so ever. I enjoy sitting outside covered from the rain and sun.

The project was left incomplete (2024). Ultimately, it became clear that the overall design was poorly conceived. It lacked proper planning and attention to detail, particularly regarding the cement patio and its drainage. Had these aspects been addressed beforehand, the result would have been far more functional and satisfactory, eliminating the need for another intervention.

I was absolutely thrilled with his service! He took the time to explain everything that needed to be done, even going as far as to compare it to what his competitors offer. Additionally, he was very open about a necessary addition to the project that we hadn't anticipated. His team worked safely, even when unexpected rain storms hit. I can't speak highly enough of his company.

AAA pro screening is a fabulous company. Ivan is honest and very talented. He does an excellent job and treats your job as if it were his property. He is efficient and trustworthy. He is punctual and my husband and I are completely satisfied with his work

I was totally amazed at the profession IMS and care from the start. From the minute Ivan walked onto my patio to assess the damage done to my screened enclosure I felt confident that he was a true professional He was absolutely maniacal in his taking of the measurements. He even found places where the enclosure might collapse because of age and wear and tear. He put every single observation down in his book and he did so meticulously. His price for the entire work was slightly higher than the ot

Ivan did a really great job. He uses a lot of common sense along with his skills. He showed up on time and worked through the job, including the next day. I thought his prices were fair. He has done work for me before and it is quality and lasts a long time. His crew did a very neat and quick job of setting up and then taking away their tools. They cleaned up very nicely as well.

Ivan did a fantastic job in rebuilding my 20 year old Lanai structure and bringing it up to Code. It is sturdier than ever. He was meticulous in the details. The new supports and screens look great. He also kept his word and started and finished the job when he said. I highly recommend using AAA Pro Screening Inc.

This company is very reliable, kind, courteous and responsive to the true needs of their customers.
It is VERY difficult to come by company with such STRONG attributes.   We found them!!!!  Just wish they did plumbing, electrical, carpet cleaning and a list of other home maintenance needs!!!
Thank YOU, AAA Pro Screening!!!!!
You are the BEST at customer service/responsibily I have found in years!!!

I highly recommend AAA Pro Screening.  Ivan provided a prompt estimate and gave us a detailed explanation of what needed to be done.  Although a prior company had done a shoddy job installing our super gutter, Ivan did not try to talk me into re-doing the project or including unnecessary add-ons.  Ivan replaced multiple patio screens and secured the entire enclosure.  The best thing about hiring AAA is that Ivan is in charge and is on site supervising/working on the project, ensuring that it is

Ivan and his crew from AAA Screening replaced several panels in my patio screen enclosure along with several other issues and did a very professional job. I was impressed with the price, quality of work and time it took and would certainly recommend them. 5 stars.

I dealt directly with the owner Ivan. Very knowledgeable and easy to talk to. I had to do a difficult screen repair and they did a great job at a great price. Also got it done in less than a week from the day I received my estimate. I highly recommend them!

AAA Pro Screening installed gutters and downspouts on our home, and repaired/replaced our lanai screening, door, and framework. We are extremely pleased with all the improvements completed by AAA Pro Screening. Ivan was very meticulous about every aspect of the job resulting in a great finished product. Ivan was also very professional throughout the process answering all our questions, promptly returning phone calls, and finishing the job timely. I highly recommend AAA Pro Screening.

We are so happy to have found Ivan to fix our aluminum patio roof. He is a perfectionist and did an amazing job. They were always prompt and provided excellent communication.  He also came to our rescue by helping us source quality work for another problem when we were stuck. He was a pleasure to work with and we are so grateful we found him and his company!  Highly recommend!
Recently had our condo patio enclosed with a screen enclosure, Ivan was honest and knowledgeable throughout the whole process from start to finish.

AAA screening did our entire screened in patio. Ivan and company did sn outstanding job. They cleaned everything replaced old nails and screws and the job we rate would be an A plus. It was excellent in every way   I would not hesitate to call him again or recommend him to anyone! A great company to deal with!!!!

I have a 34 year old pool screen enclosure. Two years ago we decided to rescreen it. After we did, the canopy kept coming loose and falling out. The technician kept saying that it was because the correct spline was no longer available and that we had raccoons walking on it. We had another company come out and replace the canopy screen. Same problems occurred, same answer from the new company. I wasn’t going to give up, and saw Ivan’s website and how his company replaced screens with cleaning the

We would give a million stars if we could!! Ivan and his crew worked miracles!! We had 3 leaks in our super gutter (installed years ago by a different company) and the original installers had tried 5 times to repair - then declared them "unfixable"!! So, half of our patio had always been unusable in the rain. Thank goodness a Google search lead us to AAA Pro Screening! Ivan assessed the situation, and came up with a creative solution that ultimately FIXED the unfixable! Thank you, Ivan!! We are

They renewed our lanai cage and replaced all of the screen and gutters. Always on time, courteous and cleaned up all decree. Couldn’t be more pleased with their work and have recommended them to friends and neighbors. Thank you guys! The lanai looks absolutely brand new!

Highly recommend AAA Pro Screening. I received estimates from four or five vendors before deciding on Ivan at AAA. His price was competitive, and I sensed that it wasn't just hype when he described how he works, the care he takes, etc. He did an excellent job in building a new, unscreened porch in my backyard. The quality of his craftsmanship is excellent, and he took great care to make sure all measurements were double- and triple-checked, he cut on the aluminum on site to ensure everything fit

I contacted AAA Pro Screening regarding super gutter replacement. During initial visit, Ivan explained the replacement procedure in detail which was very helpful and insightful. My previous gutters had a leak due to water pooling and Ivan explained it was due to improper pitch. The gutter replacement took about 4 days to complete and once finished i was extremely pleased with the end result. Not only replaced gutters look great, but most importantly they work great too! Overall, i highly recomme
Did a great job at a reasonable price and got it do e same day.

Ivan and his team did a superb job replacing the old supergutter with new and more modern one. He also replaced external bracing with up to date code compliant fixtures which look modern and professional.
Highly recommend AAA!

Ivan and his crew arrived right on time and did an excellent job of replacing all the screens in my front porch. The crew did the work, cleaned up after the work was done, and the cost of the job was very reasonable.i would highly recommend AAA Pro Screening to my neighbors and friends!

Ivan and his crew came out at the last moment for me due to my schedule. He was able to give me a quote and do the whole job really quick and clean that day. The screens look really great. I would Absolutely use them again and recommend them to anyone I know.
Ivan and his crew did an amazing job!! Very efficient and affordable.  I highly recommend him!

Ivan, and his company, AAA PRO SCREENING, recently rescreened my lanai, made slight structural changes of the beams on the western side of the lanai to lessen the slope, and put a super gutter on that side, too. Wow! What a difference. I can now sit out there in a heavy rain and not worry about getting wet. The screening, itself, was impeccably and professionally done.
There is no way that I could recommend Ivan highly enough. He is old school, no nonsense, meticulous, professional, reasonably p

Ivan did a great job with screening my front entrance .  He and his team very knowledgeable  and processional
I would recommend this company for  all your screening jobs

My experience with AAA Pro Screening was great! Very friendly and outstanding service on my porch screens and sliders. Also put in a new screen door. Very happy with their work. Recommend this company highly. Reasonable pricing also.

Ivan did a wonderful job on replacing our front door screen.. He and his assistant worked together as a wonderful team..
I contacted Ivan yesterday, and he was able to complete the job today 👍🏻
Fair price and a fine new screen ..
I recommend Ivan without hesitation..

AAA pro screening recently screened in our back porch. Throughout the process they did a great job communicating with us while staying on top of permits, getting approval from our HOA, and staying on time and on budget. I would highly recommend this company, and will be contacting them again in the future for other projects.

We have used AAA Pro Screening a number of times for screen repairs .  We highly recommend this company.  Their pricing is fair and honest, the workmanship is excellent and they always arrive at the agreed date and time.

Ivan and company are fantastic.
They definitely know what they're doing. Very efficient, we'll use them again.
Thank you so much, Ivan.

IVAN is a perfectionist.The work that he did on my screened in lanai was wonderful beyond my expectations. I referred him to a friend who also couldn’t stop raving about his work and hired him and was completely satisfied.Thanks IVAN, you are a true professional. Joel in Boynton Beach

Did a full pool enclosure re-screening and gutter repair.  Takes pride in the work they do and does things the right way. Solved our gutter overflow problem with their excellent attention to detail. Would recommend to a friend!
Had my pool enclosure reinforced. New screws on bottom and steel cables running from the top to bottom.  They did a great job. Very professional.
AAA Pro screen navigated all the building permits and HOA requirements very professionally.  Also did a excellent job on the enclosure on schedule and on budget.
Ivan was very fair in price. Ready to do job. Very professional and cleaned up after. Will be using him again for future jobs.
Ivan replaced a super gutter on the back of my house. He is very meticulous with his work and explains everything, and it looks great!

The quality of work provided was excellent.  They replaced my super gutter, frame & screens

The rain water flows properly through the super gutter now & there are no leaks

I highly recommend this company for this type of work & the price for this work was reasonable
Ivan did an amazing job replacing our pool screen.  Very punctual and for a great price.
Ivan did a really great job adding widemouth gutters and new screens to my pool enclosure
Excellent customer service!  Showed up on time, and did a beautiful job!  Highly recommended!  I will be using you for future needs!
great work! reliable, professional. explained what needed to be done. best price of 3 estimates. recommend without reservation.
Great company and Ivan is amazing. He’s very professional and knowledgeable.
Ivan was a pleasure to work ,super knowledgeable and fixed all my existing problems .Definitely would highly recommend
Quality job at a great price. Highly recommend
